mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery (gtitle, gcontent, gfile, mno) VALUES (#{gtitle}, #{gcontent}, #{gfile}, (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid}))
mapper.select: SELECT gno, gtitle, gfile, if( date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(gdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(gdate, '%h:%i'), date_format(gdate, '%m-%d') ) as gdate , glike FROM gallery WHERE gdel=1 ORDER BY gno desc
SELECT g.gno, g.gtitle, g.gfile, date_format(g.gdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %h시 %i분 %s초')as gdate, g.glike, m.mname, m.mid FROM gallery g JOIN member m on g.mno=m.mno WHERE g.gno=#{no}
